events.name: Introduction to Google AI

venue.name: MakersMadurai
venue.address_1: I Floor,Arunachala Arcade, #33/36, TPK Road, Madurai -Thirumangalam Rd, Pasumalai, Madurai, Tamil Nadu 625004

events.description:
The objective of this meetup is to give introduction about Google AI and deep learning technology. We introduce API.AI to participants and give hands-on experience on building a "Hello Chatbox" with API.AI. 

Agenda

 4:00 to 4:15 PM Welcome Note 

 4:15 to 4:45 PM Keynote on Google AI 

 4:45 to 5:00 PM  Google AI Demo Videos 

 5:00 to 5:30 PM Introduction to API.AI 

 5:30 to 6:00 PM API.AI hand-on session "Building Hello Chatbot" 

 6:00 to 6:30 PM  Feedback & Photo shoot 

 6:30 to 7:00 PM Tea break & Networking

events.name: Open Web Challenge by GDG Madurai

venue.name: MakersMadurai
venue.address_1: I Floor,Arunachala Arcade, #33/36, TPK Road, Madurai -Thirumangalam Rd, Pasumalai, Madurai, Tamil Nadu 625004

events.description:
GDG Madurai Conducting this challenge purpose of creating awareness about Google Developer Groups.

Open web challenge is a one day Hackathon, in which; students will be given Awareness about the latest Technologies and they will experiment in Building & Hosting their own Virtual or Digital resume within 8 hours. Best performers will be getting into OutOfBox Camp to showcase their talent / Ideas. Out of Box camp is a week long internship program to visit Google device lab and get an industrial experience at Bangalore. From this week long program, participants can get more exposure and they will get an opportunity to interact with the CEOs of many startups. Apart from being an academic participant, they will get to know available latest technologies in the market.

Timing 10.00 am to 05.00 pm

Venue - II Floor,Arunachala Arcade, #33/36, TPK Road, Madurai -Thirumangalam Rd, Pasumalai, Madurai,[masked], Madurai. ( Next to Seran Arch - Upstairs of SBI and Axis Bank ATM )

events.name: Google Developer Groups Madurai Orientation

venue.name: Mannar Thirumalai Naicker College
venue.address_1: Vilachery Main Road, Pasumalai, Madurai, Tamil Nadu 625004

events.description:
GDG Madurai is going to initiate orientation program of GDG for Computer Science Pupils from Mannar Thirumalai Nayak College. Apart from the academy from this event, students can able get awareness about recent trends and GDG.
The objective of the event is to introduce Google design thinking process. The students encouraged to solve the local problem with design flows. What we going to do in One Day
1. About speaker
2. Why do you register in meet up?
3. What is Geeks Event and GDG Madurai
4. Motivation Talk
5. Dive into Technology
6. Open Source Challenge

events.name: GDG Madurai DevFest 2K17

venue.name: VGrand Hotel
venue.address_1: No. 5, 120 Feet Road, Mattuthavani To Surveyor Colony Road, Madurai, Tamil Nadu 625007

events.description:
Women Tech Maker and GDG planned to conduct the “GDG DEV FEST 2K17” Program on 04 November 2017. 

We believe that people should get equal opportunity to learn about Technology. 

This event includes Progressive Web App and Firebase. This offers hands-on technical workshops to encourage enthusiastic beginners as well as Pro Developers to take the challenge and get an experience of developing upcoming platforms like Machine Learning, Artificial Intelligent, Progressive Web Apps and Google Firebase.

The Venue and Date will be announced very soon.

Be Cool, Stay Hungry...

If you want to be a participant, 

Register into this URL - tinyurl.com/gdgmdudevfest17

If you want to be a speaker 

Register into this URL - tinyurl.com/devfest17speaker
events.how_to_find_us: GDG Madurai DevFest Registration URL -> tinyurl.com/gdgmdudevfest17

events.description:
Come listen to the technology influencers in your city, to learn more about the cloud and best practices around Dev Ops. Meet fellow developers to share resources, learn and form discussion around technical topics.

events.name: Google Developer Day 2017 Extended Madurai
events.description:
Google Developer Days (GDD) are global events showcasing the latest developer products and platforms from Google to help you quickly develop high quality apps, grow & retain an active user base, and tap into tools to earn more.

Learn about our latest updates to Android, the Mobile Web, Firebase, Machine Learning, Cloud, IoT, and Design.
Enjoy technical talks, hands-on learning via Training, Codelabs and Demos, and 1:1 interactions with Google engineers. Day 1 will end on a high tone with an After Party.

Agenda

TIME                               EVENT NAME

10.00AM -10.15AM   KEYNOTE

10.15AM-10.45AM    OVERVIEW OF GDD EVENT

10.45AM-11.15AM    Overview of AMP on Google

11.15AM-11.30AM     TEA BREAK

11.30AM-12.30PM    BUILDING A webapp WITH FIREBASE AND CLOUD FIRESTORE

12.30PM-1.00PM     COMMUNITY BUILDING Q/A SESSION, NETWORKING AND WRAP UP

events.name: IndiabuildsActionon Campaign Kickoff

venue.name: MakersMadurai
venue.address_1: I Floor,Arunachala Arcade, #33/36, TPK Road, Madurai -Thirumangalam Rd, Pasumalai, Madurai, Tamil Nadu 625004

events.description:
Actions on Google and Google Assistant are one of the major Google technical areas and we want to invite the whole developer community to learn about creating Actions for the Google Assistant.
“#IndiaBuildsActions” is an open and modular event series designed for individuals and communities in India to build actions that #SolveForIndia.
Join us to build innovative and unique actions that are locally relevant, taking into account aspects of language, devices, battery consumption and connectivity, solving problems for India in the space of agriculture, education, healthcare, fintech, e-commerce etc.

events.description:
I/O brings together developers from around the globe for talks, hands-on learning with Google experts, and the first look at Google’s latest developer products.

Google IO Extended Madurai events help developers from around Madurai take part in the I/O experience.

6:45 to 7:00 Showcase Student Build AI Models
7:00 to 7:30 Network dinner

Online Registration
http://tinyurl.com/gdgiomadurai18

events.name: GDGMadurai Devfest 2018
events.description:
GDG DevFests are community-run developer events happening around the globe focused on community building and learning about Google’s technologies.

GDG DevFest Madurai brings together the community experts in AI/ML, Web and Cloud technologies to Madurai for day long sessions, workshops and code labs.This year our theme for the devfest is “AI first” we are bring expert speakers from AI/ML to deliver a talk and workshop.

Registration here
https://goo.gl/TCd5k3

events.name: International Women Day AI challenge
events.description:
Event Details

Date: 30-Mar-2019, Saturday
Time : 9:30 AM to 5:30 PM.
Venue: Rajadhani hotel.
About the Event
International Women Day AI challenge brings women from all the age groups together to learn and build the AI models with their families. Its two-day event where all the participants will complete the AI challenge using experimental AI learning. The families will exhibit the models on the second day of the program to juries.

Target audience
=> Young school girls
=> College girls
=> Graduated/working women
=> Homemakers

AI challenges
1. Build a “No Wire” Circuit - Build a circuit using conductive everyday objects

2. Engineer a Safe Stopping Robot - Engineer a robot that turns itself off when it leaves a safe area.

3. Build a Neural Network - Create a network that classifies information
Build a Parallel Processing Machine - Build something that can sort data through multiple parallel channels

4. Build a Self Driving Car Game - Build a game board that acts as a system of circuits to alert and navigate around obstacles

5. Design a Robotic Arm - Design a robotic arm that can move a marble, a straw, and a coin from the table into a cup without using your hands.

6. Build a Robotic Face - Build a robotic face that can make facial expressions using simple machines.
